name: Dark Corridors
storyline:
It's May 19, 2014, as Jake Swanson, you and your team are called to a police assignment. Your task as a speacial unit is clear.

When the B-22 unit entered the abandoned building, the problems began.

Commander Jake Swanson lost contact with his team and was forced to look for himself. When he entered the building, he was hit by something in the head and fell to the ground.

He woke up a little later in a small room unknown to him. When he woke up, he got a message over his radio, but it stopped immediately...
summary: Explore, survive and report! A horror-based exploration game. Experience a story of betrayal, hate, and human rights violations as Jake Swanson. Bring the truth to the public.
